org.apache.xerces.impl.xs

Class XMLSchemaValidatorBase.XSIErrorReporter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.xerces.impl.xs.XMLSchemaValidatorBase.XSIErrorReporter
  • Enclosing class:
    XMLSchemaValidatorBase

    protected final class XMLSchemaValidatorBase.XSIErrorReporter
extends java.lang.Object
    A wrapper of the standard error reporter. We'll store all schema errors in this wrapper object, so that we can get all errors (error codes) of a specific element. This is useful for PSVI.
